name: CLEAN THE WORLD (AlexVo)
description:
Welcome to "Clean the World", a low poly style puzzle platformer game set in a 3D world. 

In this game, you will control a small ball and collect smaller objects to grow in size and overcome obstacles in order to progress through the levels and win the game!

THE BIGGER BALL THE BIGGER ITEMS CAN BE COLLECTED

The game has been developed using Unity Engine and C#, and is available to play in a WEBGL browser on itch.io.

Movement: Move the ball using WS keys and rotate it using AD keys! 

Collecting Objects: As you move through the levels, you will need to collect smaller objects in order to grow in size and overcome obstacles. Collecting these objects will increase your mass score, which is displayed in the left corner of the screen. 

Once you reach a certain mass, you will unlock the next level.

 The mass requirements for each level are:

 Level 1:     0 tones, 

Level 2:     1,5 tones,

 Level 3:     5 tones, 

Level 4:     15 tones, 

Level 5:     40 tones.

The game has 5 levels and you will progress through the levels by collecting bigger and bigger objects. 

HEY! WATCH OUT DEEP WATER!

Have fun and enjoy the game!
